<meta name="robots" content="noindex">

<style>
.shr-header__links li:last-child { display: none !important; }
.shr-header__sign-up { display: none !important;}
.shr-card__info-btn, .shr-card__close-btn { display: none !important; }
.shr-footer .shr-footer__title { display: none !important; }
.btn { text-transform: none !important; }
.disclaimer-link { color: white !important; color: white !important;    font-weight: 500 !important;   text-decoration: none !important; }
.shr-message-banner--alert .shr-message-banner__dismiss, .shr-message-banner--alert .shr-message-banner__copy::after { display: none !important; }
.shr-header__links-crown li { margin-right: 14px !important;}
.shr-header__links li { padding: 11px 20px 20px 20px !important; }
@media (min-width: 1024px) { .shr-header__links li:last-child {  position: absolute;    right: 3rem;    float: right; } }
@media (max-width: 1024px) {   .shr-header__top a {    font-size: 16px !important; } }
@media (max-width: 767px) {
   .shr-footer__col--logo { padding: 10px 0 3rem !important; max-width: 100%;}
   .shr-footer__bottom-links { display: inline-table !important; column-count: 1; }
   .shr-footer__top { margin-bottom: 0.5rem !important; }
   #js-shr-footer__explore { margin-bottom: 1rem ! important; }
   .shr-footer__top ul  { margin-bottom: 2rem ! important; }
}
/*LOB Nav Links*/
.shr-header__links-crown--left li a { color: #fff9; }
@media (min-width: 1025px){ .shr-header__links-crown--left li:first-child a:after { content: "|"; margin-left: 15px; color: #715414; } }
@media (max-width: 1024px){ 
    .shr-header__bottom > ul{ display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child { order: 7; margin-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #656a70; padding-top: 15px; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) { order: 8; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) { order: 9; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) { order: 10; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) { order: 11; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) { order: 12; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) { order: 13; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(8) { order: 2; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(9) { order: 3; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(10) { order: 4; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(11) { order: 5; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(12) { order: 6; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) a,.shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) a,  .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) a,   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) a { color: #fff9;} 
}

/* Hamburger Menu */
@media screen and (max-width: 1024px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 85% !important; } }
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 100% !important; } }

</style>

<script>
$(function () {
 
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://unity.hardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  

 // resize iframe
 const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-card__content");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight +20; //add 20 for padding.
    //console.log(iframeHeight);
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);

  
});

</script>

value.text: Earn and redeem incredible rewards while doing what you love.

All you have to do is activate your online account. You will be asked to enter your account number and 3 pieces of personal identifying information that we have on file.

Once your account has been verified, you will be asked to create a unique username and a secure password and activate your online account.

<script>
$(function () {
 
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://unity.hardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  

 // resize iframe
 const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-card__content");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight +20; //add 20 for padding.
    //console.log(iframeHeight);
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);

  
});

</script>
<style>
.shr-card__cta--center {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
</style>

<script>
$(function () {
  const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-main");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://www.unitybyhardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);
});
</script>

<meta name="robots" content="NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW" />
<style>
.btn { text-transform: none !important; }
.disclaimer-link { color: white !important; color: white !important;    font-weight: 500 !important;   text-decoration: none !important; }
.shr-header__sign-up { display: none !important; }

/* Footer */
@media (max-width: 767px) {
   .shr-footer__col--logo { padding: 10px 0 3rem !important; max-width: 100%;}
   .shr-footer__bottom-links { display: inline-table !important; column-count: 1; }
   .shr-footer__top { margin-bottom: 0.5rem !important; }
   #js-shr-footer__explore { margin-bottom: 1rem ! important; }
   .shr-footer__top ul  { margin-bottom: 2rem ! important; }
}

/* LOB Nav Links */
.shr-header__links-crown--left li a { color: #fff9; }
@media (min-width: 1025px){ .shr-header__links-crown--left li:first-child a:after { content: "|"; margin-left: 15px; color: #715414; } }
@media (max-width: 1024px){ 
    .shr-header__bottom > ul{ display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child { order: 7; margin-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #656a70; padding-top: 15px; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) { order: 8; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) { order: 9; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) { order: 10; }

<script>
$(function () {
 
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://unity.hardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  

 // resize iframe
 const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-card__content");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight +20; //add 20 for padding.
    //console.log(iframeHeight);
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);

  
});

</script>

<script>
$(function () {
  const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-main");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://www.unitybyhardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);
});
</script>

<style>
.btn { text-transform: none !important; }
.disclaimer-link { color: white !important; color: white !important;    font-weight: 500 !important;   text-decoration: none !important; }
.shr-header__sign-up { display: none !important; }

/* Footer */
@media (max-width: 767px) {
   .shr-footer__col--logo { padding: 10px 0 3rem !important; max-width: 100%;}
   .shr-footer__bottom-links { display: inline-table !important; column-count: 1; }
   .shr-footer__top { margin-bottom: 0.5rem !important; }
   #js-shr-footer__explore { margin-bottom: 1rem ! important; }
   .shr-footer__top ul  { margin-bottom: 2rem ! important; }
}

/* LOB Nav Links */
.shr-header__links-crown--left li a { color: #fff9; }
@media (min-width: 1025px){ .shr-header__links-crown--left li:first-child a:after { content: "|"; margin-left: 15px; color: #715414; } }
@media (max-width: 1024px){ 
    .shr-header__bottom > ul{ display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child { order: 7; margin-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #656a70; padding-top: 15px; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) { order: 8; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) { order: 9; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) { order: 10; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) { order: 11; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) { order: 12; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) { order: 13; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(8) { order: 2; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(9) { order: 3; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(10) { order: 4; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(11) { order: 5; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(12) { order: 6; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) a,.shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) a,  .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) a,   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) a { color: #fff9;} 
}

/* Hamburger Menu */
@media screen and (max-width: 1024px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 85% !important; } }
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 100% !important; } }

</style>

为您的 Unity 账户创建一个新密码。
至少包含 1 个大写字母
至少包含 1 个小写字母
至少包含 !@#$%&* 中的 1 个特殊字符
不同于您之前的 5 个密码
与您的电子邮箱地址不同
包含 8 至 20 个字符

value.text: 必須年滿二十一 (21) 歲才能賭博。在佛羅里達州必須年滿十八 (18) 歲才能參加賓果和撲克活動。在多明尼加共和國必須年滿十八 (18) 歲。硬石 (Hard Rock) 會向其主顧提供 PlayersEdge 資訊，以在所有參與地點提倡負責任的博弈。智取而不是運用小聰明違規。如果您或您認識的任何人有賭博問題，在加州、伊利諾州、紐澤西州、內華達州、旁達加納、維吉尼亞州請致電：1-800-GAMBLER (426-2537) or ncpgambling.org；佛羅里達州: 1‑888‑ADMIT‑IT (236-4848) 或 gamblinghelp.org，佛羅里達州賭博強迫症委員會；印地安納州：1-800-994-8448；俄亥俄州：1-800-589-9966。
版權 © 硬石國際 (Hard Rock International)（美國）有限公司。保留所有權利。
Do Not Sell My Personal Information

ENTER DAILY FOR YOUR CHANCE TO WIN
EXCLUSIVE EXPERIENCES

We’re offering UNITY members the chance to win once-in-a-lifetime experiences with the biggest names in music, sports, and entertainment in the world’s coolest locations.

value.text: 必須年滿二十一 (21) 歲才能賭博。在佛羅里達州必須年滿十八 (18) 歲才能參加賓果和撲克活動。在多明尼加共和國必須年滿十八 (18) 歲。硬石 (Hard Rock) 會向其主顧提供 PlayersEdge 資訊，以在所有參與地點提倡負責任的博弈。智取而不是運用小聰明違規。如果您或您認識的任何人有賭博問題，在加州、伊利諾州、紐澤西州、內華達州、旁達加納、維吉尼亞州請致電：1-800-GAMBLER (426-2537) or ncpgambling.org；佛羅里達州: 1‑888‑ADMIT‑IT (236-4848) 或 gamblinghelp.org，佛羅里達州賭博強迫症委員會；印地安納州：1-800-994-8448；俄亥俄州：1-800-589-9966。
版權 © 硬石國際 (Hard Rock International)（美國）有限公司。保留所有權利。
Do Not Sell My Personal Information

<script>
$(function () {
 
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://unity.hardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  

 // resize iframe
 const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-card__content");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight +20; //add 20 for padding.
    //console.log(iframeHeight);
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);

  
});

</script>

    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) { order: 9; }

    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) { order: 11; }

    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) { order: 13; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(8) { order: 2; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(9) { order: 3; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(10) { order: 4; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(11) { order: 5; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(12) { order: 6; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) a,.shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) a,  .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) a,   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) a { color: #fff9;} 
}

至少包含 1 個大寫字母
至少包含 1 個小寫字母
至少包含 1 個特殊字元：!@#$%&*
與您之前 5 個密碼不同
與您的電子郵件地址不同

<script>
$(function () {
 
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://unity.hardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  

 // resize iframe
 const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-card__content");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight +20; //add 20 for padding.
    //console.log(iframeHeight);
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);

  
});

</script>

<script>
$(function () {
  const wrapper = document.querySelector(".shr-main");
  let iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
  const inputField = document.querySelectorAll(".shr-input-field");
  const sourceUrl = "https://www.unitybyhardrock.com";

  $("#js-shr-login__submit").click(function () {
    if ($(".shr-input-field--error").length == 0) {
      window.parent.postMessage("showSpinner", sourceUrl);
    }
  });
  window.parent.postMessage("hideSpinner", sourceUrl);
  window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
    iframeHeight = wrapper.clientHeight;
    window.parent.postMessage(`iframeHeight: ${iframeHeight}`, sourceUrl);
  });
  resizeObserver.observe(wrapper);
});
</script>

<meta name="robots" content="NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW"/>
<style>
.btn { text-transform: none !important; }
.disclaimer-link { color: white !important; color: white !important;    font-weight: 500 !important;   text-decoration: none !important; }
.shr-header__sign-up { display: none !important; }

/* Footer */
@media (max-width: 767px) {
   .shr-footer__col--logo { padding: 10px 0 3rem !important; max-width: 100%;}
   .shr-footer__bottom-links { display: inline-table !important; column-count: 1; }
   .shr-footer__top { margin-bottom: 0.5rem !important; }
   #js-shr-footer__explore { margin-bottom: 1rem ! important; }
   .shr-footer__top ul  { margin-bottom: 2rem ! important; }
}

/* LOB Nav Links */
.shr-header__links-crown--left li a { color: #fff9; }
@media (min-width: 1025px){ .shr-header__links-crown--left li:first-child a:after { content: "|"; margin-left: 15px; color: #715414; } }
@media (max-width: 1024px){ 
    .shr-header__bottom > ul{ display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child { order: 7; margin-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #656a70; padding-top: 15px; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) { order: 8; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) { order: 9; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) { order: 10; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) { order: 11; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) { order: 12; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) { order: 13; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(8) { order: 2; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(9) { order: 3; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(10) { order: 4; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(11) { order: 5; } 
   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(12) { order: 6; } 
    .shr-header__bottom li:first-child a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(2) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(3) a, .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(4) a,.shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(5) a,  .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(6) a,   .shr-header__bottom li:nth-child(7) a { color: #fff9;} 
}

/* Hamburger Menu */
@media screen and (max-width: 1024px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 85% !important; } }
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .shr-header__mobile { width: 100% !important; } }

</style>
